title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Thomas H. Cormen et al.
description: Comprehensive coverage of algorithms with mathematical rigor

title: Design of Reinforced Concrete
author: Jack C. McCormac
description: A widely used book for understanding structural design in Civil Engineering

title: Engineering Mechanics: Dynamics
author: J.L. Meriam, L.G. Kraige
description: Covers core mechanical engineering dynamics concepts

title: Electrical Engineering: Principles and Applications
author: Allan R. Hambley
description: Introductory book in Electrical Engineering fundamentals

title: Mechatronics: Principles and Applications
author: Godfrey C. Onwubolu
description: Covers integration of mechanical, electrical, and computer systems

title: Elementary Principles of Chemical Processes
author: Richard M. Felder, Ronald W. Rousseau
description: Foundation book in Chemical Engineering education

title: Fundamentals of Nuclear Reactor Physics
author: Elmer E. Lewis
description: Covers the physics behind nuclear reactors

title: Introductory Mining Engineering
author: Howard L. Hartman, Jan M. Mutmansky
description: Fundamental book in mining practices and engineering

title: Architecture: Form, Space, and Order
author: Francis D.K. Ching
description: A foundational architecture textbook on visual design and form
